question: Rajendra Kumar Bhandarim, who was seen in news recently, is the winner of which award?
option1: Subhash Chandra Bose Aapda Prabandhan Puraskar
answer: Subhash Chandra Bose Aapda Prabandhan Puraskar
explanation:
The Ministry of Home Affairs has recently announced the Subhash Chandra Bose Aapda Prabandhan Puraskar for 2021.
As per the notification, Rajendra Kumar Bhandari has been selected in the individual category of the award, while the Sustainable Environment and Ecological Development Society (SEEDS) has been selected for the award in the institutional category.
